law.catch_line: Appeal of any order to Franklin Circuit Court.
law.text: Any licensee or any applicant aggrieved by any final order of the racing commission may appeal to the Franklin Circuit Court in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 458, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 14, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 150, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 13, effective June 16, 1960.
